entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
